description:
{RHelp Topic{W: alias{x <argumemnt>(command) / <remove>(argument) / <list>

{Walias (argument) (command):{x
     This sets a command to said argument.

{Walias remove (argument):{x
     Removes the specified alias.

{Walias list:{x
     Shows you a list of aliases you currently have.
